properties.name: Atlanta
properties.notes:
We'll be at the Taco Mac at the Prado in Sandy Springs, on Roswell Rd, just inside the Perimeter. Look for us in the covered outdoor section after 6:30PM. Double check our FB page in case of any last minute changes.

https://www.facebook.com/PuzzledPintAtlanta/

Hope to see you in person!

properties.name: Auckland
properties.notes: Please register your team using the following form. Please note we have limited tables available this month - first in, first served!

properties.name: Austin
properties.notes: Welcome back to our former south location! No need for reservations. Happy Hour runs till 7, and we (GC) will be here from 6-9pm. If numbers start to exceed 80 on a regular basis we will look at returning to our previous two location setup. Thank you for supporting Austin Puzzled Pint!

properties.name: Bangalore
properties.notes: We're at a different location in Indiranagar this month - Bohemians on 12th Main, Indiranagar! Register at - https://insider.in/event/puzzled-pint-bangalore-august-2023/buy/shows/64ca88a05ac32a0008b461d8/Tickets

properties.name: Bay Area - East Bay
properties.address: 4006 Martin Luther King Jr Way, Oakland, CA 94609

properties.name: Bay Area - San Francisco
properties.notes:
San Francisco game control volunteers will be hosting Puzzled Pint at two San Francisco locations again this month from 6pm to 9pm. Come puzzle with us at either venue.

The Napper Tandy at 3200 24th Street in the Mission District

Enjoy Irish pub food, drinks, and ambiance along with your puzzles at The Napper Tandy. Ample outdoor and indoor seating options. Look for game control outside by the door to pick up a puzzle set.

OR

Willkommen at 2198 Market Street in Castro/Hayes Valley

Solve your puzzles with us over craft beers and German-American food at the Willkommen beer hall. Features both indoor and outdoor seating, though the outdoor table surface may be somewhat less conducive to puzzling. Consider bringing a good writing surface if you prefer the outdoor option; we'll try to have some on hand to loan. Note that this location closes at 9pm, so we won't be able to stay beyond that.

properties.name: Bay Area - Silicon Valley
properties.notes: Apologies Bay Area Solvers! We are virtual this month as we were not able to secure a location. If you would like a puzzle packet, or have any leads on potential future locations, please email us at puzzledpintsv@gmail.com. We hope to see you some day in-person soon!

properties.name: Boston
properties.notes:
Please let us know if you plan to attend at https://pp-rsvp.com/YLW7QP so we can print enough puzzle sets - preferably by the end of Monday.

Scissors are useful this month, so please bring them if you can!

NOTE that the brewery does not serve food! They are fine with you bringing in food, though - and there are food vendors located inside of Bow Market.

properties.name: Boulder
properties.notes:
PLEASE NOTE: There are multiple Murphy's in Boulder County - we're meeting at the one in Louisville!

We don't have a reserved section - just let the host stand know that you're here for Puzzled Pint and would like a table. Once you're seated, come find us and let us know you're here!

properties.name: Brno
properties.notes: Write to Yeti (yeti@physics.muni.cz) if you plan to come. If you want a reservation, make one yourself. Thanks!

properties.name: Cape Town
properties.address: Shop G37, Howard Centre,, Cape Town, WC 7405
properties.notes:
For more information or directions, please call Babsie.

082 716 9252

properties.name: Charlottesville
properties.bar: Brazos Tacos @ Barracks Road Shopping Center
properties.notes:
Brazos Tacos @ Barracks Road Shopping Center!

Note that this is the NEW Brazos Tacos location (where the old Brixx Pizza used to be in the Barracks Road Shopping Center), NOT the Brazos location at the Ix Art Park!

They have nice indoor and outdoor seating (including covered outdoor seating even if the weather isn't perfect). Tacos and alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks are now available.

Please RSVP to puzzledpintcho@gmail.com if you will definitely or probably attend!

properties.name: Chicago - City
properties.notes: We will be in the back (left) near the long tables

properties.name: Chicago - City North
properties.notes: RSVP at https://pp-rsvp.com/QPT2WA !

properties.name: Christchurch
properties.notes: See you at the Bealey, and remember to book your table at https://www.bealeyquarter.co.nz/drink-dine/

properties.name: Columbia, Maryland
properties.address: 6181 Columbia Crossing Cir, Columbia, Maryland, MD 21045
properties.notes: Bring scissors this month if possible . GC will have some, but it's always good to be prepared.

properties.name: Coventry
properties.notes: It is a brand new bar - let's welcome them to Coventry!!

properties.name: DFW - Dallas
properties.address: 4488 Spring Valley Rd, Farmers Branch, TX  75244

properties.name: Denver
properties.notes:
Please remember to RSVP at denverpuzzledpint@gmail.com.

See you there!

properties.name: Detroit Metro
properties.address: 2234 N Canton Center Rd, Canton, MI 48187

properties.name: Edinburgh
properties.notes:
We're a bit out of town for August, away from the hubbub (and tourist-crowded pubs!) of the festivals.

Please have someone from your group send us a quick RSVP to PuzzPintEdi@protonmail.com so we know roughly how many puzzles to print!

properties.name: Galway City
properties.address: 3 William Street west, Galway, C H91V184

properties.name: Houston
properties.notes: Street parking is free after 6pm, if you can find it!

properties.name: Huntsville
properties.notes:
We will be set up inside the main area. Looking forward to seeing everyone there!

They do sell pizza! I recommend ordering early if you are wanting food.

For more info, visit us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PuzzPintHSV.

properties.name: Jersey City/Hoboken
properties.notes: We'll be sticking in Hoboken this month at Far side! Come join us inside or out on the patio!

properties.name: Kansas City
properties.notes: One of us has a baby due shortly. Going to hold off this month in case we have an earlier surprise like with our first. See you in September!

properties.name: Kitchener-Waterloo
properties.notes: RSVP to travisandhanna@gmail.com by Monday night so we can give an update to the bar and know how many sets to print!

properties.name: Leeds
properties.notes:
For anyone who hasn't heard (I am terribly sorry about this - I'll try to get better at cimmunicating message about events!), Puzzled Pint in Leeds is back in-person on a permanent basis now.

Join us for "Questionable Letters" this coming Tuesday (8th August) from 7pm onwards at The White Swan, next to City Varieties in the centre of Leeds.

We do run an informal Zoom call every month for anyone who is unable to attend in-person, on a different Tuesday of the month ; do contact us if you'd like information on how to join that instead.

properties.name: London
properties.notes:
At the moment Puzzled Pint London is still running remotely. You're encouraged to join your friends in a video call and solve Puzzled Pint together.

We'll be running the event through our online tool at https://puzzledpint.live/.

You can download the puzzles and check your answers from 7pm on Tuesday

GC will be available to help on request too

properties.name: Los Angeles - Inland Empire
properties.address: 402 W Arrow Highway, San Dimas, CA 91773
properties.notes: Taco Tuesday! Please FB message or email to RSVP.

properties.name: Los Angeles - Northeast
properties.notes:
We will be in the bar again (indoor and outdoor seating)

Don't forget your pencil :)

properties.name: Los Angeles - Santa Monica
properties.notes: We're back at Santa Monica Brew Works this month! Come enjoy some local brews and food from next door while you solve puzzles either on the patio or inside. This is a popular place so we highly recommend getting there early so you can get a spot. This is a great set, don't miss it!

properties.name: Madison
properties.notes: RSVPs are optional but appreciated: if you RSVP for your team at gc.madisonpuzzles.com by Tuesday morning, we will be sure to set aside a puzzle set for you. (We will also bring extra sets, so please come even if you haven't RSVP'd!)

properties.name: Manchester
properties.notes:
We're back at an old favourite: The Horse and Jockey in Chorlton!

As usual, if you're coming as a team, you can start any time from 7:00. If you're coming alone then please arrive by 7:30 and we will find you a team to join.

properties.name: Melbourne
properties.notes:
We are at The Black Prince this month! We will be seated up the back. (They've agreed to turn the music volume down this time!)

Please RSVP so we know how many puzzle sets to print: https://pp-rsvp.com/HDHL2C

Please give us some feedback on our past venues, we'll put the favourites into higher rotation: https://forms.gle/JVYWBTDQZxtSpN5B8

Need help remembering Puzzled Pint each month? Click here to add a recurring event to your Google calendar

properties.name: Missoula
properties.notes: We'll be at Draught Works from 5-8 pm!

properties.name: Montreal
properties.address: 32 Rue Beaubien E, Montreal, QC H2S 1P8
properties.notes: Please RSVP here if you can: https://www.facebook.com/events/1331305801136860

properties.name: Nashville
properties.notes:
We are back in a bar again. Come visit, and RSVP to be sure you get a puzzle set. RSVP at https://forms.gle/13xrcZR3EUDQNGiD9

Look for the Puzzled Pint logo on the table near the door.

properties.name: New York City
properties.address: 133 W 33rd St, New York City, NY 10001
properties.notes: A return to the cellar of Stout MSG / Penn - this is downstairs in the basement as you walk in!

properties.name: Norwich
properties.notes: Call the pub on 01603 464461 if you want to book a table and message us either on Facebook or email to let us know you're coming. We'll need to know how many puzzles to print.

properties.name: Orange County
properties.address: 7821 Edinger Ave., Ste. 122, Huntington Beach, CA 92648
properties.notes:
This month we'll be at Four Sons Brewing (aka HB Hot Chicken) located at Bella Terra in Huntington Beach.

We'll be starting at our earlier 6:00 pm time.

Please RSVP here:
https://pp-rsvp.com/2ZPGR9

properties.name: Ottawa
properties.notes:
Back in the Byward Market!

Please let us know you're coming by getting free tickets on eventbrite - it helps us know how many puzzles to print! (* especially important this month as there are more than one areas we can reserve)

Kevin and Steph

properties.name: Philadelphia
properties.notes: We will be on the 2nd floor.  Not sure if there will be a host/door person to let you up.  If you get there before 7, check in at the bar (or a server).  I expect to get there by 6:30.  New location!

properties.name: Phoenix
properties.notes:
Phoenix Puzzlers!

Whether you are a regular or checking us out for the first time, please come and join other puzzlers for an evening of puzzlin' fun.

Look for Mark in 'The Yard'.

Bring a pencil or pen. We'll have other things like scissors, tape, etc., if you need them.

Bring friends!

properties.name: Pittsburgh
properties.notes:
We're back at East End this month, hopefully the weather will hold up and we can enjoy the outdoor space! They've got pizza and other similar food available, as well as of course their own brewed beers.

***Also for this month***, we'll be collecting school supplies to support the Black Liberation Autonomous Collective of Southwestern PA's drive, see here! https://www.instagram.com/p/CvTM2v1MYin/ Bookbags, crayons, notebooks, and pencils are highly requested items. Lightly used and cleaned items such as bookbags are welcome.

properties.name: Portland, Oregon
properties.notes: This month's set will require SCISSORS! So highly suggest you bring some if you don't want to use our sub-par ones.

properties.name: Prague
properties.notes:
Let's hope it won't rain.

Please fill the RSVP form at https://puzzledpint.sifrovacky.cz/praha.html

properties.name: Sacramento
properties.notes:
Plan to arrive before 6:30pm if you would like help finding a team.

Please RSVP on Meetup so we know how many puzzle sets to print. Join me at Puzzled Pint https://meetu.ps/e/MjhpH/VtV2f/i​

properties.name: Seattle - City
properties.notes:
We're running two simultaneous events in Seattle! Please follow the Eventbrite link below to RSVP for the location you will attend:

  • Capitol Cider, 818 E Pike St, Seattle, WA 98122
  • Old Stove Brewing Ship Canal, 600 W Nickerson St, Seattle WA 98119

RSVP here (once per team): https://www.eventbrite.com/e/puzzled-pint-seattle-august-2023-tickets-690214579387

(One location may fill up sooner than the other, and we only have enough packets printed for those who register, so be sure to RSVP as early as possible.)

Join the Puzzled Pint Seattle Discord server: https://discord.gg/cK9FTsegNf

properties.name: St. Louis
properties.notes: We're back at Bombers! And we've got a great set for you all to puzzle over. Let us know your team is coming by either emailing me (r_becker@sbcglobal.net) or RSVP-ing to the Facebook event!

properties.name: Stafford
properties.notes: Come out and do some cool brain teaser puzzles! It's family friendly though the puzzles can be hard (we are there to help!)

properties.name: Sydney
properties.notes:
As you enter the venue walk straight ahead and down the stairs, we have reserved the whole room at the very back of the venue all for us!

Please bring your own stationery if possible, however we will have things to lend out!

Please like and share our facebook page and please leave us a review!

properties.name: Syracuse
properties.notes: Look for the Puzzled Pint table tent to pick up puzzles for your team - Game Control will be available with puzzles and hints from 6-9PM! The Ali Baba Gyros & Tacos food truck is scheduled to be there from 4-8PM.

properties.name: Toronto
properties.notes:
Looking forward to seeing everyone this Tuesday, August 8, 2023.

We will be set up at our GC table to help with the puzzles from 6:00 - 9:00 PM

Please join us in the Discord between events for other puzzle-related fun!

Puzzled Pint Toronto is currently overseen by: Michaela and Stu at the GC table and Andria for venue booking and social media

properties.name: Tromsø
properties.notes:
NOTE: New location due to the weather! We meet outside Skansen (yellow old building on a little hill).

Follow the facebook page (/puzzledpinttos) for updates.

properties.name: Tulsa
properties.bar: The WEL Bar at Mother Road Market
properties.notes: We're back at The WEL Bar at Mother Road Market for August. Game Control will be there from 6:00-9:00 pm. Look for the Puzzled Pint table topper. We'll be near the bar area, but you can take your puzzles anywhere in Mother Road. This location has loads of drink and food options and is friendly for all ages. You may want to check the website for a map of the parking if you haven't been before. The lot directly to the west usually has spots open. We hope to see you there!

properties.name: Twin Cities
properties.notes:
HeadFlyer has plenty of seating outdoors and indoors. Pups are welcome in both areas. For food, they have arranged for La Costenita food truck to be onsite.

HeadFlyer is next to a free parking lot and a bike rack. It's right on the 61 bus line and a couple more frequent lines are a few minutes' walk away.

Please RSVP by midnight on Monday so we can print a packet for your team and give the venue a headcount: https://pp-rsvp.com/LH4VEM ⭐❣️😎

properties.name: Valencia
properties.notes:
This month, our beloved El Garaje is closed, so we will NOT have a live Puzzled Pint :(

You can still follow the puzzles on our Telegram chat. We'll be back in September!

properties.name: Victoria
properties.notes:
The Moon Under Water loves us when can tell them a headcount, if possiblle, please RSVP per team to chris@enigmaticevents.com. Also please email us if you'd like to be on to our reminder email list.

We will have one side of the bar reserved for us until about 7.15. Look for the Yellow table sign for the puzzle packs!

properties.name: Washington - Arlington/City
properties.notes: Washington DC-City/Arlington will be back once again at Spider Kelly's in Clarendon. If you are planning to attend, please RSVP to puzzledpintdc@gmail.com so we know how many teams to expect and sets to print.

properties.name: Wellington
properties.address: Level 1, 66 Tory St (above Mabel’s), Wellington, WGN
properties.notes:
This month we are over at the new Mean Doses taproom on Tory Street.
Please have one person in your team RSVP at https://pp-rsvp.com/ZZJSBE or ELSE!
This month it would be good to bring scissors, we'll have some spares in case you forget.

properties.name: Zurich
properties.notes: This month we're at The Alehouse – Palmhof just up the road from ETH Zentrum (nearest tram stop is ETH/Universitätsspital). See you there!
